title: LF Team High Silver+
body:
Looking for players to start up and ranked 5's team, just comment with these details filled out and I will get onto you in game.

Age:
Main Role:
Pref Champions (Of desired role):
Skype(Y/N):
Current Rank:

replies.body:
Age: 20
Main Role: JG/ADC
Pref Champions (Of desired role): Rek Sai, Vi, Sejuani/Vayne, Graves, Lucian
Skype(Y/N): Yes
Current Rank: Gold 3

Age: 20
Main Role: Mid (but can top/jung and supp just as well)

Pref Champions (Of desired role): Mid: Brand, malzahar, veigar  - Picks depend who opposition/team has picked. 
Supp: Leona, blitz, sona.

Skype(Y/N): Y

Current Rank: Silver 2

Age: 22/23
Main Role: Support
Pref Champions (Of desired role): Ali, Janna, Thresh, Leona, Braum, Sona 
Skype(Y/N): Yes
Current Rank: Silver 2
If all goes well we are just after a support. If anyone is comfortable with support.

Age:16
Main Role: JG
Pref Champions: Vi Jarvan Rengar Rek'Sai
Skype(Y/N): yes
Current Rank: Silver 3

Age: 17-18
Main Role: ADC
Pref Champions: Kalista, Graves, Jinx
Skype(Y/N): Yes i have skype
Current Rank: Silver 3 but was gold 5 last season

Pref Champions (Of desired role):Any ADC's really
